title: Nasdaq-listed Coinbase plans to ramp up tech hiring and investments in India - Economic Times
content: Nasdaq-listed Coinbase plans to ramp up tech hiring and investments in India  Economic Times
description: Founder of Nasdaq-listed Coinbase Inc., Brian Armstrong wrote, “Coinbase Ventures has already invested $150 million in home-grown Indian technology companies in the crypto and web3 space, and is constantly identifying new opportunities to help Indian founders scale.”
